item.title: Getting Thrift into Maven Locally
item.author: carl@halls.farm (Carl Hall)
item.description: I spent the better part of a morning trying to figure out how to get Thrift to be available in a Maven repository for a project I’m working on. Yes, I know there’s a JIRA issue for this but the comments are not clear and it’s more tailored towards publishing in the central Apache repository. Also, I tried using ‘ant publish’ and got “Execute failed: java.io.IOException: Cannot run program “../../compiler/cpp/thrift”: java.io.IOException: error=2, No such file or directory”. I don’t need that kind of problem installing a library nor do I want to build the whole Thrift library.
